name: cryptix
description:
If you want to contact me on a different channel, see my [pub key ledger](%U5wfpbfWURifzmqBV3xizc/m1N7okzbsk3Sr4s8zOcY=.sha256).


If you like techno music, I sometimes share releases I like [here](%oSYWDGRYFpfIs2metXliqBb5ItftW++4vXjpx89tfNA=.sha256) and you can find set recordings [here](%A5FV7cjpgD9mSOUEuvS2PHvFhLExdh83lMrhtEZ5xS4=.sha256). If you want to surprise me, I regularly update [my bandcamp wishlist](https://bandcamp.com/werryb/wishlist).

I also hack on a lot of stuff. #golang if I can but try to be more pragmatic these days.

Also working on [tale:net](%pa69+6ICtclE8lbJmSCpS0BlGU2polpx5VY543bhEWk=.sha256) (on [github](https://github.com/talenet/talenet)).
* Here is it's initial mission statement: %q6Im24T1TPRiHrBA5OmjN1dW3Ss4xYuGH+jPAgDdaCQ=.sha256
* find some history on #talenet and our [blog](https://blog.t4l3.net)

name: christoph@verse

I'm working with Tom Coates, rabble, cryptix, and Christian Bundy on an SSB iOS client.  Looking forward to meeting the community at ssb-camp in late February :)

Professional:  https://hermiteer.com

name: Christian Bundy
description:
Human in [Cascadia][1] trying to do the right thing(s). **We have enough for everyone.**

- Testing #manyverse on my [other identity][7].
- Working with software systems at [Fraction][2].
- Raising [Jerome and Sunshine][3] with [Kathleen][4]. 
- Tinkering with [@libra.fraction.io][5] and [@Current Events][6].
